attributes.action: Old Teign Valley Line from Exeter and Heathfeild Branch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Govt should instruct the Ministry of Transport to create a new diversion using the old Teign Valley Line from Exeter and Heathfeild Branch through Newton Abbot enabling the Main SW Line of First Great Western to bypass the Dawlish Sea Wall due to coastal erosion
